entry.title: Monday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 27 March 2023
